00013 class Plugins_Twitter_DB extends Common_DB
00014 {
00015     static protected $_message;
00016     
00017     /**
00018      * @return void
00019      */
00020     function __construct()
00021     {
00022         parent::__construct();
00023     }
00024 
00025     /**
00026      * @param Zend_Rest_Client_Result $resp
00027      * @param integer $owner
00028      * @param integer $idUP
00029      * @return Message_Data
00030      */
00031     public static function save(Zend_Rest_Client_Result $resp, $owner, $idUP)
00032     {
00033         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00034         $messageMapper = Message_Mapper::get_instance();
00035 
00036         if (!isset($resp->status)) {
00037 
00038             $tmp = $resp;
00039             $resp = new stdClass();
00040             $resp->status = $tmp;
00041         }
00042         
00043         $remoteIds = array();
00044 
00045         foreach ( $resp->status as $response ) {
00046 
00047             $status = array(
00048                 'created_at' => date("Y-m-d H:i:s", strtotime((string) $response->created_at)),
00049                 'id' => (string) $response->id,
00050                 'text' => (string) $response->text,
00051                 'source' => (string) $response->source,
00052                 'favorited' => (string) $response->favorited,
00053                 'user_name' => (string) $response->user->name,
00054                 'user_screen_name' => (string) $response->user->screen_name,
00055                 'retweet_count' => (string) $response->retweet_count,
00056                 'profile_image_url' => (string) $response->user->profile_image_url,
00057             );
00058 
00059             $data = array(
00060                 'source' => $status['source'],
00061                 'favorited' => $status['favorited'],
00062                 'user_name' => $status['user_name'],
00063                 'retweet_count' => $status['retweet_count'],
00064                 'profile_image_url' => $status['profile_image_url'],
00065             );
00066 
00067             self::$_message  = New Message_Data();
00068             self::$_message->setRemoteId($status["id"])
00069                     ->setIdU($auth->getUserId())
00070                     ->setIdUP($idUP);
00071 
00072             $existingMessages = $messageMapper->find(self::$_message);
00073             if (count($existingMessages) > 0) {
00074 
00075                 self::$_message = $existingMessages[0];
00076             }
00077 
00078             self::$_message->setTitle($status["text"])
00079                     ->setPublishDate($status["created_at"])
00080                     ->setLink("http://www.twitter.com/".$status["user_screen_name"])
00081                     ->setData(serialize($data))
00082                     ->setOwner($owner);
00083 
00084             if (self::$_message->isValid()) {
00085 
00086                 $remoteIds[] = self::$_message->getRemoteId();
00087                 //self::$_message->print_r();
00088                 $messageMapper->save(self::$_message);
00089 
00090             } else {
00091 
00092                echo "\r\n\r\nSomething happend:\r\n\r\n<pre>";
00093                print_r(self::$_message->getErrors());
00094                print_r(self::$_message->getOptions());
00095                continue;
00096             }
00097         }
00098 
00099         if (self::$_message instanceof Message_Data) {
00100         
00101             /***
00102              * Borrar mensajes eliminados en twitter
00103              */
00104             $where = array(
00105                 "where" => array(
00106                     "messages.owner" => self::$_message->getOwner(),
00107                     "messages.remoteId >" => $remoteIds[count($remoteIds)-1],
00108                     "idup" => $idUP
00109                 ),
00110     
00111                 "where_not_in" => array(
00112                     "messages.remoteId" => $remoteIds
00113                 )
00114             );
00115     
00116             $messages = $messageMapper->customQuery($where);
00117     
00118             foreach ($messages as $msg) {
00119     
00120                 echo "Deleting twitter message with id: ".$msg->getId()."\r\n";
00121                 $messageMapper->delete($msg);
00122             }
00123         }
00124 
00125         return self::$_message;
00126     }
00127 }
